Posts.Content: I joined this site so I would hopefully not feel alone . Yet somehow I still feel alone . Im sat here on a sunday a couple of weeks into being diagnosed and still not come to terms with this just keep crying
Posts.Title: feel alone

Posts.Content: As a lady told me welcome to the head fuck. Sorry to swear but it is. Its about 5 weeks since ive been diagnosed im due to start chemo you are not alone big hugs xx
Posts.Title: I feel Shellshocked.

Posts.Content: I had a sentinal biopsy yesturday and I have noticed two puncture marks on my belly does anybody know why this would have occured as its confusing .
Posts.Title: unknown puncture marks

Posts.Content: I'm a born fighter never thought of chemo as a friend maybe thats the way to view it. As its there to rid this . Omg such an easy way to look at chemo thank you so much x pls keep in touch and good luck and good health xx
Posts.Title: so my nightmare begins

Posts.Content: Mamagrams, ultra sound, mri, now had CT scan next is bone scan then oh not to worry a scan on my heart . All before I see oncology on wednesday. Then I find out when I start Chemo scared is not a word to discribe this . I've heard so many horror stories about chemo I am very scared.
Posts.Title: so my nightmare begins

Posts.Content: Hi hun yes I have cancer exactly where I occassionally placed my phone down my bra I feel this had something to do with it even though I am advised it did not
Posts.Title: mobile phone and breast cancer
